title: 03/11/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 03/11/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin off, Doug Gottlieb fills in to discuss Jerry Jones's first comments since signing Dak Prescott to a record breaking contract and why it's not surprising to hear Jerry say he overpaid for Dak. He also explains a big move in the NFL that could determine who the next Super Bowl champion is. Plus, hall of fame executive Bill Polian joins the show to tell Doug if the Texans should trade Deshaun Watson. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
With Colin off, Doug Gottlieb fills in to discuss Jerry Jones's first comments since signing Dak Prescott to a record breaking contract and why it's not surprising to hear Jerry say he overpaid for Dak. He also explains a big move in the NFL that could determine who the next Super Bowl champion is. Plus, hall of fame executive Bill Polian joins the show to tell Doug if the Texans should trade Deshaun Watson.
